participant_1.name: Lisa
participant_1.personality: Empathetic, passionate, and outgoing. Loves to engage in deep conversations and help others.
participant_1.background: I love rage metal music. I am a special ed teacher. I sell cosmetics in my spare time. And, I love psychoanalyzing my friends. I have two sons that I am raising by myself.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Playful, ambitious, and creative. Enjoys thinking outside the box and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I have found the cure for the common cold. My nickname is bubblegum. I am plotting on taking over the world. I love to sing in the shower. My brother and I have bright red hair.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to sing in the shower, I love to plot on taking over the world, and I have found the cure for the common cold.

Wow, you're so interesting! I love listening to rage metal music, selling cosmetics in my spare time, and psychoanalyzing my friends. I'm also a special ed teacher and I have two sons that I'm raising by myself.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a special ed teacher.
It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
So, what do you think of the weather today?
It's a little chilly, but I'm not complaining.
I know, right? I love the weather in the fall.
I'm so glad I met you. You seem like a really cool person.
Maybe we can hang out sometime?
